name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bud on its back starts swelling, it emits a sweet aroma.

name: Venusaur
description: The flower on its back absorbs sunlight. It needs it for energy.

name: Charmander
description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Charizard
description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: Blastoise
description: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high-speed tackles.

name: Caterpie
description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
description: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

name: Butterfree
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

name: Kakuna
description: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

name: Beedrill
description: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.

name: Pidgeot
description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.

name: Rattata
description: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, it is certain that 40 more live in the area.

name: Raticate
description: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It seems to slow down if they are cut off.

name: Spearow
description: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

name: Fearow
description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land.

name: Ekans
description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.

name: Arbok
description: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

name: Pikachu
description: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity can cause lightning storms.

name: Raichu
description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

name: Sandshrew
description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

name: Sandslash
description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

name: Nidoran♀
description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: Nidorina
description: The female’s horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

name: Nidoqueen
description: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this Pokémon. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.

name: Nidoran♂
description: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.

name: Nidorino
description: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

name: Nidoking
description: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey’s bones.

name: Clefairy
description: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

name: Clefable
description: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: Vulpix
description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

name: Ninetales
description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
description: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

name: Zubat
description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

name: Golbat
description: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: Oddish
description: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

name: Gloom
description: Smells incredibly foul! However, around one out of a thousand people enjoy sniffing its nose-bending stink.

name: Vileplume
description: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
description: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

name: Parasect
description: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushrooms on its back. They appear to do all the thinking.

name: Venonat
description: Its large eyes act as radar and can detect even slight movements in the air.

name: Venomoth
description: Flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Diglett
description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

name: Dugtrio
description: A team of Diglett triplets that burrow through the ground at high speed.

name: Meowth
description: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

name: Persian
description: A graceful and dignified Pokémon. If it lashes its tail, it can keep the enemy at bay.

name: Psyduck
description: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily Pokémon will use psychokinetic powers.

name: Golduck
description: Often seen swimming elegantly by lakeshores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

name: Mankey
description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

name: Primeape
description: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

name: Growlithe
description: Very protective of its territory. It will bark loudly to warn off intruders.

name: Arcanine
description: A legendary Pokémon in some cultures. It runs incredibly fast to protect its loved ones.

name: Poliwag
description: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It seems to prefer swimming to walking.

name: Poliwhirl
description: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: Poliwrath
description: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: Abra
description: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and teleport to safety.

name: Kadabra
description: It emits a peculiar alpha wave from its body. It can unleash this wave to cripple foes.

name: Alakazam
description: Highly intelligent. Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. It memorizes everything it reads.

name: Machop
description: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become a master.

name: Machoke
description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its strength.

name: Machamp
description: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

name: Bellsprout
description: Prefers to soak up sunlight. It uses its roots to soak up water and nutrients.

name: Weepinbell
description: When hungry, it spits out poison powder to incapacitate the prey and then devours it.

name: Victreebel
description: Lures prey with a sweet honey-like aroma. The prey is then devoured by the large, powerful jaws.

name: Tentacool
description: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging tentacles.

name: Tentacruel
description: Often found in deep-sea trenches. Its 80 tentacles are used for swimming and catching prey.

name: Geodude
description: Found in mountainous areas. It can cling to walls and boulders to avoid falling.

name: Graveler
description: Rolls down slopes to move. It can quickly crush anything in its path.

name: Golem
description: Its body is as hard as iron. It rolls into battle to knock down opponents.

name: Ponyta
description: Its flaming mane shines brightly. It is very fast and can outrun most opponents.

name: Rapidash
description: Its hooves can crush stones. It runs so fast it seems to be flying on flames.

name: Slowpoke
description: It is slow and dopey. It is known to take naps in the middle of battle.

name: Slowbro
description: The Shellder attached to its tail causes it to become very slow, but also very powerful.

name: Magnemite
description: Uses electromagnetic waves to communicate with others. Can float in the air.

name: Magneton
description: Formed by a cluster of three Magnemite. Emits powerful magnetic waves.

name: Farfetch'd
description: Carries a stalk of green onions as a weapon. Rarely seen without it.

name: Doduo
description: A bird Pokémon with two heads. It can run at high speeds.

name: Dodrio
description: Three heads work together to find prey and avoid danger.

name: Seel
description: Swims at high speeds, hunting fish beneath the ice.

name: Dewgong
description: Has a sleek body for swimming. Can dive to great depths.

name: Grimer
description: Appears in filthy areas. It spreads a stench that causes fainting.

name: Muk
description: A toxic pile of sludge that can melt anything with its body.

name: Shellder
description: Closes its shell to protect itself. Shoots water from its mouth at high speed.

name: Cloyster
description: Creates spikes by rapidly freezing water. Its shell is extremely hard.

name: Gastly
description: A gas Pokémon that hides in darkness. It envelops its foes in gas to cause fainting.

name: Haunter
description: Frightens enemies by licking them with its tongue. Can pass through walls.

name: Gengar
description: Likes to lurk in shadows. It hides in darkness and uses its shadow to attack.

name: Onix
description: A giant rock snake. It tunnels through the ground at high speeds.

name: Drowzee
description: Can put enemies to sleep and eat their dreams.

name: Hypno
description: Carries a pendulum to put foes to sleep and control their minds.

name: Krabby
description: Its pincers are hard and can crush anything. It can swim backward quickly.

name: Kingler
description: Has a huge claw that is bigger than its body. It is very strong.

name: Voltorb
description: Looks like a Poké Ball. It can explode if startled.

name: Electrode
description: Highly volatile. It explodes with little provocation.

name: Exeggcute
description: A cluster of six eggs. They communicate telepathically with each other.

name: Exeggutor
description: A Pokémon resembling a palm tree with multiple heads that can attack with psychic powers.

name: Cubone
description: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. It cries at night.

name: Marowak
description: Uses its bone club to defend itself. Can be fierce when provoked.

name: Hitmonlee
description: A master of kicking techniques. Its legs stretch like springs.

name: Hitmonchan
description: Known for its boxing skills. Throws punches with lightning speed.

name: Lickitung
description: Uses its long tongue to catch prey and explore its environment.

name: Koffing
description: Emits poisonous gases that can cause fainting in enemies.

name: Weezing
description: Produces toxic gases that can be fatal to those nearby.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Charges at its foes with a brutal headbutt.

name: Rhydon
description: Its tough hide can withstand any attack. It charges at full speed.

name: Chansey
description: A kind Pokémon known for healing others with its nutritious eggs.

name: Tangela
description: Its vines are always moving. It entangles enemies to immobilize them.

name: Kangaskhan
description: A powerful Pokémon that protects its young fiercely.

name: Horsea
description: Swims swiftly using its tail. Shoots ink to escape predators.

name: Seadra
description: An aggressive Pokémon that attacks with sharp spines.

name: Goldeen
description: Known for its beautiful fins and graceful swimming.

name: Seaking
description: Powerful swimmer with a sharp horn used for attacks.

name: Staryu
description: Has a core that glows in the dark. It regenerates lost limbs.

name: Starmie
description: Its core shines brightly and can emit a mysterious glow.

name: Mr. Mime
description: Creates invisible walls with its hands to block attacks.

name: Scyther
description: Moves at blinding speeds and slices foes with its sharp scythes.

name: Jynx
description: Sings and dances to hypnotize its foes with ice powers.

name: Electabuzz
description: Discharges electricity from its body to shock opponents.

name: Magmar
description: Its body is always burning hot, spewing fire from its mouth.

name: Pinsir
description: Uses its powerful pincers to crush opponents.

name: Tauros
description: A wild and aggressive Pokémon, known for charging with great force.

name: Magikarp
description: Famous for its weak attacks but can evolve into a powerful Pokémon.

name: Gyarados
description: Fierce and intimidating, known for causing destruction.

name: Lapras
description: Gentle and intelligent, it carries people across the water.

name: Ditto
description: Can transform into any Pokémon it sees.

name: Eevee
description: A highly adaptable Pokémon that can evolve into many different forms.

name: Vaporeon
description: Has the ability to melt into water and become invisible.

name: Jolteon
description: Generates powerful electric shocks to paralyze foes.

name: Flareon
description: Its fiery body can reach extreme temperatures to scorch opponents.

name: Porygon
description: A man-made Pokémon that can convert its body into digital data.

name: Omanyte
description: An ancient Pokémon revived from a fossil shell.

name: Omastar
description: Uses its tentacles to capture prey and defend itself.

name: Kabuto
description: A prehistoric Pokémon that lives at the bottom of the sea.

name: Kabutops
description: Sharp scythes on its arms cut through foes easily.

name: Aerodactyl
description: A prehistoric Pokémon with a fierce nature and fast flight.

name: Snorlax
description: Spends most of its time sleeping and is very difficult to wake.

name: Articuno
description: A legendary bird that controls ice and snow.

name: Zapdos
description: A legendary bird that controls lightning and thunder.

name: Moltres
description: A legendary bird engulfed in flames.

name: Dratini
description: A mystical Pokémon that sheds its skin to grow.

name: Dragonair
description: Has the power to control weather and is graceful in the water.

name: Dragonite
description: A powerful and kindhearted dragon Pokémon with immense flying speed.

name: Mewtwo
description: A legendary Pokémon created from Mew’s DNA, extremely powerful.

name: Mew
description: A rare Pokémon said to contain the genetic codes of all Pokémon.

name: Chikorita
description: A gentle Pokémon that uses its leaf to sense temperature.

name: Bayleef
description: Its leaf aroma can calm emotions and boost vitality.

name: Meganium
description: Uses petals to release a soothing aroma and heal wounds.

name: Cyndaquil
description: Flames erupt from its back when it’s angry or startled.

name: Quilava
description: Flames blaze fiercely, and it’s quick on its feet.

name: Typhlosion
description: Shoots intense flames from its neck to protect itself.

name: Totodile
description: A feisty Pokémon with powerful jaws and strong swimming ability.

name: Croconaw
description: Has a row of spines on its back and a powerful bite.

name: Feraligatr
description: Uses its massive jaws to crush foes with great force.
